high_descs: to take a soapbottle hand wash
take the desklamp to walk along.
turn around go straight and turn left to reach the bed.
pick the soapbottle from the bed
walk back and head to the desklamp table
The perfume went to the desklamp as soon as the desklamp light came on.
anns.task_desc: The SoapBottle light came on as soon as the perfume went to the DeskLamp table

high_descs: walk along the room to reach the bed.
take the soapbottle in the bed
The perfume moves towards the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Take the SoapBottle in the bed turn on the DeskLamp
